name: Environaut\Config\Reader\Dom\DomDocument
short_desc: Environaut DOM document implementation with convenience wrapper methods that by default use the Environaut configuration namespace for queries.

load.name: load
load.short_desc: Loads XML from a file and registers the Environaut configuration namespace if the XML document is an Environaut configuration file.
load.hint_desc: true on success; false on error
exceptions: in case of errors loading the document from the given file

options.name: options
options.short_desc: libXml flags to use for loading (like LIBXML_NOCDATA etc.)

loadXml.name: loadXml
loadXml.short_desc: Loads XML from a string and registers the Environaut configuration namespace if the XML document is an Environaut configuration file.
loadXml.hint_desc: true on success; false on error
exceptions: in case of errors loading the document from the given string

options.name: options
options.short_desc: libXml flags to use for loading (like LIBXML_NOCDATA etc.)

schemaValidate.name: schemaValidate
schemaValidate.short_desc: Validates the current document according to the given schema file.
exceptions: in case of validation errors or non-readable file

schemaValidateSource.name: schemaValidateSource
schemaValidateSource.short_desc: Validates the current document according to the given schema file content.
exceptions: in case of validation errors or empty schema

xinclude.name: xinclude
xinclude.short_desc: Substitutes XIncludes present in the current document.
xinclude.hint_desc: number of XIncludes or false if no xincludes were found
exceptions: in case of errors xincluding content

options.name: options
options.short_desc: libXml flags to use for loading (like LIBXML_NOCDATA etc.)

getXpath.name: getXpath
getXpath.short_desc: Returns the xpath instance that handles this document.

getElementValue.name: getElementValue
getElementValue.short_desc: Returns the nodeValue of the child element with the given name.
getElementValue.hint_desc: nodeValue or null if Environaut element with that name does not exist

reference_element.name: reference_element
reference_element.short_desc: reference element for child node iteration, default to documentElement

getElement.name: getElement
getElement.short_desc: Returns the DomElement with the given name.
getElement.hint_desc: of that name or null if does not exist in the Environaut namespace

setDefaultNamespace.name: setDefaultNamespace
setDefaultNamespace.short_desc: Set the default namespace that should be used when accessing elements via convenience methods and bind it to the internal xpath instance.

getDefaultNamespaceUri.name: getDefaultNamespaceUri
getDefaultNamespaceUri.short_desc: Returns the default namespace URI used by Environaut.

getDefaultNamespacePrefix.name: getDefaultNamespacePrefix
getDefaultNamespacePrefix.short_desc: Returns the default namespace prefix used by Environaut

isEnvironautDocument.name: isEnvironautDocument
isEnvironautDocument.short_desc: Returns whether the current document is an Environaut configuration file.
isEnvironautDocument.hint_desc: true if it's an Environaut document; false otherwise

registerEnvironautNamespace.name: registerEnvironautNamespace
registerEnvironautNamespace.short_desc: Registers the default Environaut namespace on the internal xpath instance of the given DomDocument instance.

isEnvironautConfigurationDocument.name: isEnvironautConfigurationDocument
isEnvironautConfigurationDocument.short_desc: Returns whether the given document instance is an Environaut configuration file.
isEnvironautConfigurationDocument.hint_desc: true if it's an Environaut document; false otherwise

NAMESPACE_ENVIRONAUT_1_0.name: NAMESPACE_ENVIRONAUT_1_0
NAMESPACE_ENVIRONAUT_1_0.short_desc: Default namespace of Environaut configuration files.

NAMESPACE_PREFIX.name: NAMESPACE_PREFIX
NAMESPACE_PREFIX.short_desc: Default namespace prefix for Environaut configuration files.
